translated: The Drop of Reasons also has the purpose of establishing valid cognitions, since it expresses the definition of reasons.

original: lhag mar gyur pa nyid kyis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag ba sun 'dod par byed pa'i tshad ma nye bar ston par byed pa'i don can kho na yin no //

translated: The Principles of Debate also has the purpose of teaching valid cognitions, since it teaches the valid cognitions of direct perception and inference, and since it teaches the valid cognitions that refute the false presentations that are left over from the two types of inferential valid cognitions for the sake of others.

original: de bzhin du rgyud gzhan sgrub pa ni rjes su dpag pa'i khyad par rnams la phyi rol gyi don du smra ba las don dam pa'i rigs pa mtshan nyid mi mthun pa can yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyud gzhan sgrub pa ni rjes su dpag pa'i khyad par rnams la phyi rol gyi don du smra ba las don dam pa'i rigs pa mtshan nyid mi mthun pa can yin no //
translated: Likewise, the establishment of other minds is a special inference, and the reasoning about the ultimate is not the same as the reasoning about external objects.

original: yang gzhan gyi sems rjes su dpog pa la mtshan nyid mi mthun pa med pa nyid yang dag par ston par byed pa'i don can nyid kyis tshad ma yang dag par ston par byed pa'i don can kho na yin no //
analyzed: yang gzhan gyi sems rjes su dpog pa la mtshan nyid mi mthun pa med pa nyid yang dag par ston par byed pa'i don can nyid kyis tshad ma yang dag par ston par byed pa'i don can kho na yin no //
translated: Moreover, the inference of another's mind is not a special characteristic, but it is a valid cognition because it has the meaning of revealing reality.

original: 'dir ni dngos po rnam par dpyod bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni dngos po rnam par dpyod bar bya ste /
translated: Here, we must analyze things.

original: gang gis dngos po de dpyod pa na 'joms par byed pa gcig gis pha rol gyi 'dod pa dngos po'i don thams cad sun 'don par byed bas de las bzlog par gyur pa rang gi 'dod pa'i dngos po grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gis dngos po de dpyod pa na 'joms par byed pa gcig gis pha rol gyi 'dod pa dngos po'i don thams cad sun 'don par byed bas de las bzlog par gyur pa rang gi 'dod pa'i dngos po grub pa yin no //
translated: When one analyzes things, one refutes all the objects of the opponent's assertions by means of a single refutation, and thereby one establishes one's own asserted things as the opposite of that.

original: yang na gzhal bar bya ba gtso bo rnam par dpyod par byed pa'i yan lag nyid kyis kyang dngos po 'di brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na gzhal bar bya ba gtso bo rnam par dpyod par byed pa'i yan lag nyid kyis kyang dngos po 'di brtag par bya ste /
translated: Or else, this entity should be examined by the very fact that it is the primary object of evaluation, which is being analyzed.

original: 'di ltar 'brel pa'i dngos po med par ston par byed pa la dgos pa ni bdag med pa rnam pa gnyis sgrub par byed pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'brel pa'i dngos po med par ston par byed pa la dgos pa ni bdag med pa rnam pa gnyis sgrub par byed pa kho na yin no //
translated: Thus, the purpose of demonstrating the nonexistence of a related entity is the establishment of the twofold selflessness.

original: bya ba dang / longs spyod dang / byin gyis rlob pa la rang dbang med pa ni bdag gi bdag med pa yin te /
analyzed: bya ba dang / longs spyod dang / byin gyis rlob pa la rang dbang med pa ni bdag gi bdag med pa yin te /
translated: The absence of self in the self is the absence of independence in action, experience, and creation.

original: 'brel pa de med pa la bya ba 'du ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'brel pa de med pa la bya ba 'du ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is no union of action in the absence of that relation.

original: bya ba la rang dbang med pa'i phyir byed pa po bsal to //
analyzed: bya ba la rang dbang med pa'i phyir byed pa po bsal to //
translated: The agent is refuted because of the absence of independence in action.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang 'du ba med pa'i ngo bo ni longs spyod par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang 'du ba med pa'i ngo bo ni longs spyod par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the experiencer is not the nature of the absence of union with pleasure and pain.

original: byin gyis brlab pa dang 'du ba med pa na yang byin gyis rlob pa po ma yin no //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa dang 'du ba med pa na yang byin gyis rlob pa po ma yin no //
translated: The creator is not the nature of the absence of union with creation.

original: de'i phyir 'brel pa med pa na gang zag gi bdag med pa sgrub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'brel pa med pa na gang zag gi bdag med pa sgrub po //
translated: Therefore, when there is no relation, there is the selflessness of persons.

original: de bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid tsam la gnas pa gzhan gyi dbang nyid dang gzhan dang sbyor ba dang / ltos pa nyid la sogs pa med pa na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa ni chos kyi bdag med pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid tsam la gnas pa gzhan gyi dbang nyid dang gzhan dang sbyor ba dang / ltos pa nyid la sogs pa med pa na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa ni chos kyi bdag med pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, when there is no other-dependency, no connection with another, no relativity, etc., only in terms of one‚Äôs own nature, there is the selflessness of things, the non-existence of the grasped and the grasper.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tshig gi don drug kyang bkag pa yin te /üîΩsbyor pa dang / 'du ba med pa'i phyir rdul phra rab rnams la yang dag par sbyor ba med pa na rdzas rtsom pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tshig gi don drug kyang bkag pa yin te / sbyor pa dang / 'du ba med pa'i phyir rdul phra rab rnams la yang dag par sbyor ba med pa na rdzas rtsom pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the six topics are also negated.üîΩWhen there is no connection and no aggregation, there is no composition of substances, because there is no real connection of atoms.

original: de rnams la 'du ba med pa na yang de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir de dang 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid ma yin na ni rdzas ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams la 'du ba med pa na yang de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir de dang 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid ma yin na ni rdzas ma yin no //
translated: When there is no aggregation of them, there is no substance, because there is no cause that is connected with that.

original: rdul phra rab rnams kyang 'du ba med pa'i phyir bya ba dang yon tan la @22b sogs pa'i rdzas kyi chos dang bral ba rnams kyang rdzas ma yin no //
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams kyang 'du ba med pa'i phyir bya ba dang yon tan la @22b sogs pa'i rdzas kyi chos dang bral ba rnams kyang rdzas ma yin no //
translated: Since the atoms do not combine, they are devoid of the substance of action, quality, etc., and are not substances.

original: rdul phra rab rnams ni gzugs kho na yin gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i yon tan can gzhan cung zhig ni mang bas rdzas ma yin no //
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams ni gzugs kho na yin gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i yon tan can gzhan cung zhig ni mang bas rdzas ma yin no //
translated: The atoms are only form, and since they are not possessed of any other qualities such as taste, etc., they are not substances.

original: de bzhin du yon tan can dang / byed pa po dang / 'dra ba dang / mthar gyur pa'i rdzas la mi 'jug pa na yang 'du ba med pa'i phyir yon tan dang / las dang / spyi dang / khyad par rnams med pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du yon tan can dang / byed pa po dang / 'dra ba dang / mthar gyur pa'i rdzas la mi 'jug pa na yang 'du ba med pa'i phyir yon tan dang / las dang / spyi dang / khyad par rnams med pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, when the substance is not admitted as the possessor of qualities, the agent, the similar, and the ultimate, then the qualities, actions, universals, and particularities do not exist because of the nonexistence of their composites.

original: de'i phyir dngos po brtag pa rtsom pa la rtog bar byed par gyur pas brtag pa gcig po gang yin pa gzhan thams cad ma brtags pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po brtag pa rtsom pa la rtog bar byed par gyur pas brtag pa gcig po gang yin pa gzhan thams cad ma brtags pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, when one begins the examination of entities, the one who is examining does not examine all the others, since they are not separate from the one.

original: de mngon du dpyod pa rtsom pa na thams cad gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de mngon du dpyod pa rtsom pa na thams cad gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis so //
translated: When he begins the examination of the manifest, all the others are included in the examination of the manifest, since they are dependent on the manifest.

original: de la 'brel pa can gyis ji ltar 'brel par gyur pa de gang la 'brel pa zhes 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la 'brel pa can gyis ji ltar 'brel par gyur pa de gang la 'brel pa zhes 'gyur ro //
translated: How could that which is related be related to that?

original: gzhan dbang tha mi dad par 'jug pa ni 'brel pa can dag tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan dbang tha mi dad par 'jug pa ni 'brel pa can dag tu 'gyur te /
translated: The dependent is related to the relata, since it is engaged without distinction.

original: phan tshun ltos pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun ltos pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For it has the nature of mutual dependence.

original: gcig ni gzhan la ltos pa yin la pha rol po yang gzhan dbang yin no //
analyzed: gcig ni gzhan la ltos pa yin la pha rol po yang gzhan dbang yin no //
translated: One is dependent on the other, and the other is dependent on the first.

original: de'i phyir phan tshun ma spangs pa'i chos dang ldan pa de dag ni 'brel pa can yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir phan tshun ma spangs pa'i chos dang ldan pa de dag ni 'brel pa can yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are related, since they possess a property that is not mutually exclusive.

original: de ni de dag la 'brel par byas pas 'brel pa kho na gzhan gyi dbang nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: de ni de dag la 'brel par byas pas 'brel pa kho na gzhan gyi dbang nyid du brjod do //
translated: Since it is related to them, the relation is said to be the dependent itself.

original: tha dad par 'jug pa gzhan dbang ma yin pa dag la yang 'brel pa yod na ma 'brel pa gzhan lhag mar gyur pa ni med do //
analyzed: tha dad par 'jug pa gzhan dbang ma yin pa dag la yang 'brel pa yod na ma 'brel pa gzhan lhag mar gyur pa ni med do //
translated: If the independent, which is engaged without distinction, were related, then there would be no other remainder that is unrelated.

original: de'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang nyid kho na 'brel pa can nyid yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang nyid kho na 'brel pa can nyid yin la /
translated: Therefore, the dependent itself is related.

original: de yang 'brel pa las yin pas 'brel pa ni de kho na nyid yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'brel pa las yin pas 'brel pa ni de kho na nyid yin no //
translated: And since it is related to that, the relation is just that.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan dbang nyid de 'brel pa yin pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan dbang nyid de 'brel pa yin pa /
translated: Because the dependent itself is the relation.

original: de'i phyir yang dag pa nyid du 'brel pa cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang dag pa nyid du 'brel pa cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, there is not the slightest relation in reality,

original: brtag par gyur pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtag par gyur pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro //
translated: and it is also not a conceptual imputation.

original: de gang las yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang las yin zhe na /
translated: From what is that so?

original: grub pa'i bdag nyid la gzhan gyi dbang nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir de ni rang gi rgyu'i nus pa kho na las yin na /üîΩde la ltos bas sam /
analyzed: grub pa'i bdag nyid la gzhan gyi dbang nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir de ni rang gi rgyu'i nus pa kho na las yin na / de la ltos bas sam /
translated: Because the nature of the established is not tenable as dependent. If it is only from the power of its own cause,

original: ma ltos pas yin /
analyzed: ma ltos pas yin /
translated: is it dependent on that or not?

original: de la gal te ltos pa med pa ni grub par gyur ba'i rang gi ngo bo yin na 'brel pa de ni tha dad pa'i dngos po 'di bkug nas gzhan gyi dbang nyid du len par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la gal te ltos pa med pa ni grub par gyur ba'i rang gi ngo bo yin na 'brel pa de ni tha dad pa'i dngos po 'di bkug nas gzhan gyi dbang nyid du len par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: If it is not dependent, then the established is its own nature. If the relation is that, then it does not take the otherness of this different thing and make it dependent.

original: ci ste de la ltos pas rang gi ngo bo ma grub par gyur pa de'i tshe de la rang gi ngo bo thob bas gang zhig gzhan las thob pa'i bdag nyid gzhan la gzhan @23a * //üîΩdbang yin te /
analyzed: ci ste de la ltos pas rang gi ngo bo ma grub par gyur pa de'i tshe de la rang gi ngo bo thob bas gang zhig gzhan las thob pa'i bdag nyid gzhan la gzhan @23a * // dbang yin te /
translated: But if it is not established by way of its own nature because it depends on that, then at that time, since it obtains its own nature, what is obtained from another is not a nature that is dependent on another.

original: de lta bu'i bdag nyid thob pa kho na de yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bdag nyid thob pa kho na de yin te /
translated: That very nature which is obtained is dependent.

original: de la 'brel pa mi dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'brel pa mi dgos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no need for a relation in that nature.

original: thob par gyur pa'i bdag nyid la ni 'brel bas gzhan dbang du byed pa tha dad pa ma yin pa'i ngo bor brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: thob par gyur pa'i bdag nyid la ni 'brel bas gzhan dbang du byed pa tha dad pa ma yin pa'i ngo bor brjod par bya'o //
translated: But that nature which is obtained should be described as a nature that is not different from the dependent, because of the relation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir grub pa la de brgal zhing brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir grub pa la de brgal zhing brtag par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it should be argued that it is established as that.

original: de yan lag can rang gi ngo bo thob par gyur pa la rang gi ngo bo thob ma thag tu byung ba'i gzhan gyi dbang ni cung zhig kyang med do //
analyzed: de yan lag can rang gi ngo bo thob par gyur pa la rang gi ngo bo thob ma thag tu byung ba'i gzhan gyi dbang ni cung zhig kyang med do //
translated: When the possessor of the parts obtains its own nature, there is not the slightest dependent that arises immediately after the obtaining of its own nature.

original: 'o na tha dad pa ma yin pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na tha dad pa ma yin pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
translated: But if it is not different, what is called ‚Äúa nature that is not different‚Äù?

original: grub pa'i tha mi dad pa kho na yin gyi gzhan 'brel pa la ltos par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: grub pa'i tha mi dad pa kho na yin gyi gzhan 'brel pa la ltos par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it is dependent on another, a relation.

original: de la tha dad pa'i ngo bo'i rgyu las byung ba na tha dad pa'i dngos po yang gnas skabs gzhan skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni skad cig pa'i phyogs yin na yang 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de la tha dad pa'i ngo bo'i rgyu las byung ba na tha dad pa'i dngos po yang gnas skabs gzhan skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni skad cig pa'i phyogs yin na yang 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it were to arise from a cause that is different from it, then a different thing would have the characteristic of arising in another state, and it would be momentary.

original: de med pa la ni de ji ltar ba nyid du skyes pa de lta bu nyid du gnas pa de'i phyir 'di la gzhan gyi dbang nyid ci yod //
analyzed: de med pa la ni de ji ltar ba nyid du skyes pa de lta bu nyid du gnas pa de'i phyir 'di la gzhan gyi dbang nyid ci yod //
translated: But if it does not exist, then it would remain just as it is, having arisen in that way. Therefore, what is its dependent nature?

original: 'di ltar gal te de ni sems par byed par gyur na yan lag rnams la skyed par gyur pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te de ni sems par byed par gyur na yan lag rnams la skyed par gyur pa /
translated: In this way, if it were to become the agent of movement, it would cause the arising of the parts.

original: de rnams las yang dag par langs nas gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa dang / zhig par gyur pa yangs la gnas par byed par yin /
analyzed: de rnams las yang dag par langs nas gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa dang / zhig par gyur pa yangs la gnas par byed par yin /
translated: Having arisen from them, it would cause them to move elsewhere, and it would cause them to remain in another place when they disintegrate.

original: de'i phyir sems pa de ltar skyes par gyur pa gzhan du skyes pa'i rgyu ni 'dod pa kho na yin no /
analyzed: de'i phyir sems pa de ltar skyes par gyur pa gzhan du skyes pa'i rgyu ni 'dod pa kho na yin no /
translated: Therefore, the cause of the arising of that movement is just what is asserted.

original: zhig par gyur pa'i yang lci ba la sogs pa de yod pa nyid rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: zhig par gyur pa'i yang lci ba la sogs pa de yod pa nyid rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: which have been destroyed, exist.

original: rang gi bdag nyid kyi rgyu can rnams nyid ni rim pa gzhan pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa yang yin te /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid kyi rgyu can rnams nyid ni rim pa gzhan pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa yang yin te /
translated: Those that are caused by themselves also have the distinction of another state,

original: aa mra la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par bzhin no //
analyzed: aa mra la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par bzhin no //
translated: like the distinction of the state of the mango, etc.

original: de'i phyir gang ji ltar skyes par gyur pa de ni rang gi rgyu'i nus pa kho na las de ltar yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang ji ltar skyes par gyur pa de ni rang gi rgyu'i nus pa kho na las de ltar yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, whatever is born is so by the power of its own cause alone.

original: gzhan du gnas skabs gzhan dang skad cig ma gzhan skyed par byed pa'i rkyen rnams las de ltar gyur pa 'di'i thob pa ni 'ga' zhig las cung zhig yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du gnas skabs gzhan dang skad cig ma gzhan skyed par byed pa'i rkyen rnams las de ltar gyur pa 'di'i thob pa ni 'ga' zhig las cung zhig yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not so by the power of any other condition that produces another state or another moment, because it is not so by the power of anything else.

original: de'i phyir grub pa'i bdag nyid la gzhan gyi dbang nyid cung zhig kyang med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir grub pa'i bdag nyid la gzhan gyi dbang nyid cung zhig kyang med do //
translated: Therefore, the established nature has no dependence on anything else at all.

original: rgyu'i rjes su 'gro ba dang bzlog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i chos ni 'di yin gyi thob pa'i bdag nyid la khyad par gyi rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba'i dngos po gzhan gyis rnam par gzhag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i rjes su 'gro ba dang bzlog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i chos ni 'di yin gyi thob pa'i bdag nyid la khyad par gyi rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba'i dngos po gzhan gyis rnam par gzhag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The nature of a phenomenon that follows and reverses from its cause is the reason for the distinction in the nature of its attainment, and it is not established by any other thing.

original: rgyu kho na las 'di yul skyes pa yin gyi //
analyzed: rgyu kho na las 'di yul skyes pa yin gyi //

analyzed: des na de ltar skyed pa'i de ma thag pa dang gzhan du gyur pa'i dngos po rdzogs par byed pa las //

analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang nyid du thob pa'i rgyu 'brel par 'gyur na de yang med do zhes bshad zin to //

analyzed: gal te na 'du ba can dag gi yang tha dad pa'i dngos po thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /

analyzed: dper na sbyor ba can gyi bzhin du yin la /

analyzed: des na med pa kho na de la rgyu mtshan yin no //

analyzed: gal te na de la 'brel pa nus par 'gyur la de yod pas ches gzhan pa zhig pa na 'di ni srung bar yang byed par yang 'gyur te /

analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po rnams la ngo bor 'dres pa ni sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can 'brel pa yin no zhe na /

translated: We reply: No, because

translated: If the relation is the mixing of natures,üîΩHow can that be in two

analyzed: las ji ltar 'gyur // de phyir rang bzhin tha dad las //
translated: Things that are different?üîΩTherefore, the relation of different natures

translated: Is not real.

analyzed: sbyor ba can dag la gzhan gyi dbang nyid ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Things that are connected do not have a dependent nature,

analyzed: 'dod par gyur pa ci lta ba'i tha dad pa'i yang dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are different things, just as desired.

analyzed: gang gi tshe yang dag pa'i sbyor ba can yod pa de'i tshe 'dres par gyur pa'i bdag nyid 'da' bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: When there is a correct application, then there is no passing beyond a mixed identity.

original: de'i phyir ngo bo 'dres pa tsam 'brel pa yin no //üîΩgang gi phyir yang ngo bo 'dres pa 'brel pa yin pa de'i phyir tha dad pa'i dngos po rnams la don dam par 'brel pa yod pa ma yin te /

translated: Therefore, mere mixed identity is the connection.üîΩBecause mixed identity is the connection, therefore different things do not have a connection ultimately,

analyzed: tha dad pa la ngo bo 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: phan tshun bdag nyid rjes su 'du ba las phyi rol du gyur pa dag la 'dres pa 'di ci yin /

analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di dag la de nyid yod na dngos po gzhan med pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can 'brel bar 'gyur na /

analyzed: de'i phyir 'dres par gyur pa kho na 'brel pa can nyid ni ma yin te /

analyzed: de'i don ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of that is because it is impossible.

analyzed: des na 'dres pa ni 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, mixture is not contact.

original: gal te rang gi ngo bo tsam la gnas pa na 'dres pa ma yin no zhes rdul phra rab rnams la yang mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi ngo bo tsam la gnas pa na 'dres pa ma yin no zhes rdul phra rab rnams la yang mi 'gyur na /

original: de nyid 'brel ba can du gyur pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid 'brel ba can du gyur pa yang ma yin te /
translated: They also do not become contact due to that,

analyzed: dngos po'i khyad par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: khyad par 'di ni rang gi ngo bo'i bdag nyid tsam du gyur pa yin gyi /

analyzed: de yang de ltar rab tu ma grub pa ste /

analyzed: @24b des na tha dad pa rnams la ngo bo 'dres pa'i 'brel pa med de /

original: dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gal te bar ma chod pa'i bdag nyid dag ni rang gi bdag nyid tsam du grub pa las 'brel pa can nyid gzhan la ltos pa ni med kyi /

analyzed: de'i tshe gzhan la ltos pa kho na 'brel pa can nyid de yang gzhan la ltos par gyur pa ni 'brel pa kho na yin te /
translated: At that time, that which is dependent on another is the related itself. That which is dependent on another becomes the relation itself.

original: de'i de tsam don dam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i de tsam don dam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is just the ultimate itself.

analyzed: de dag la gzhan ltos pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po'i chos med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan la ltos pa kho na 'brel pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, that which is dependent on another is the relation itself.

analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin mi srid pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because:

analyzed: gzhan ltos pa ni 'brel pa can //
translated: That which is dependent on another is the related.

analyzed: de med ji ltar ltos par byed // yod pa kun la ltos med pa'i /
translated: Without that, how could it be dependent?üîΩHow could an existent thing be dependent

analyzed: dngos po ji ltar ltos par byed //

translated: For example, when the existence of a cow is possible, the nature of a cow is taught to exist in the entity of a cow.

analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la ltos pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po'i don gyi rang bzhin srid par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, the nature of an object that has a self that depends on another is not possible.

analyzed: gang gi phyir 'brel pa gzhan la ltos pa de yang yod pa 'am med pa la srid pa ma yin pa'i phyir de'i dngos po med pa kho nar gyur pa yin te /
translated: Because a connection that depends on another is not possible either in existence or nonexistence, it is only nonexistent.

original: de lta na ni med pa ltos par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta na ni med pa ltos par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: In that case, a nonexistent does not depend on anything,

original: med pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rang bzhin can gyi chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rang bzhin can gyi chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is nonexistent, and because it is empty of the nature of everything.

analyzed: 'di ltar thob pa'i rang bzhin ltos par byed pa de'i tshe thob pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: 'di la ltos bas thob par bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi yul ni yod pa ma yin no //

analyzed: gang 'di rang bzhin nyid grub pa'i bdag nyid thob pa na de la 'di ltos pa cung zhing kyang med do //

analyzed: gang yang rang bzhin du gyur pa med na de la ji ltar yang thob /

analyzed: nus pa ni med de grub pa dang ma grub pa'i bdag nyid srid pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de'i phyir 'ga' zhig la cung zhig kyang ltos pa med de //
translated: Therefore, it does not depend on anything at all.

analyzed: yod pa can dag gi 'brel pa 'di nyid la 'gal ba'i phyir ro // des na phan tshun ltos pa'i 'brel pa @25a * //
translated: Because this relation of existence is contradictory.üîΩTherefore, if they exist, they would be related through mutual dependence.

analyzed: can dag yod pa yin na gang gis de dag gi ltos pa gzhan kho na'i 'brel par 'gyur /
translated: But by what relation would they be related as different things that depend on each other?

original: des phan tshun rang bzhin gyis 'jug pa can rang rang gi ngo bo tsam la gnas par mngon par shes pa'i 'brel pa can dag ni med do //
analyzed: des phan tshun rang bzhin gyis 'jug pa can rang rang gi ngo bo tsam la gnas par mngon par shes pa'i 'brel pa can dag ni med do //
translated: Therefore, they do not have a relation that is known through their mutual intrinsic engagement in their own nature.

original: de'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa'i dngos po la sogs pa yang med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa'i dngos po la sogs pa yang med do //
translated: Therefore, the entities of the object apprehended and the subject apprehender, the entities of the manifest and the manifester, and so on, do not exist.

original: gzung ba la ltos pa ni 'dzin par byed pa nyid yin no /
analyzed: gzung ba la ltos pa ni 'dzin par byed pa nyid yin no /
translated: The subject apprehender is dependent on the object apprehended.

analyzed: gzung ba med na 'dzin pa'i nus pa 'di cung zhig kyang med de /
translated: If the object apprehended does not exist, the subject apprehender has no capacity whatsoever.

analyzed: de'i phyir gzung ba la ltos pa yin na med pa'i gnas skabs nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, if it is dependent on the object apprehended, it is not in a state of nonexistence.

analyzed: dngos po yod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin ni gzung ba la ltos par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The nature of all existent entities is not dependent on the object apprehended.

original: gal te yod pa'i gnas skabs kho na ltos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yod pa nyid 'dzin par byed pa yod pa nyid kyi gzung ba 'dzin pas de ltar gzhan pa la yang blta bar bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yod pa'i gnas skabs kho na ltos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yod pa nyid 'dzin par byed pa yod pa nyid kyi gzung ba 'dzin pas de ltar gzhan pa la yang blta bar bya'o zhe na /
translated: If the subject apprehender exists, it is dependent, and therefore, the subject apprehender exists in the state of existence.
